elements.name: To verify that a valid journey can be planned using the Journey Plan

steps.name: I have arrived at the TFL page
I enter the following postcode "SE10 0ES" into the FROM search bar of the plan journey widget
I enter the following postcode "SW1E 5NN" into the TO search bar of the plan journey widget
I click on the plan journey button
I see the journey results page
I close the website

elements.name: To verify that the widget is unable to plan a journey when there is one invalid location

steps.name: I have arrived at the TFL page
I enter the following postcode "SE10 0ES" into the FROM search bar of the plan journey widget
I enter the following postcode "bzbzbzb" into the TO search bar of the plan journey widget
I click on the plan journey button
I see the journey results page
I see the "Sorry, we can't find a journey matching your criteria" error dialog
I close the website

elements.name: To verify that the widget is unable to plan a journey when there are two invalid locations

steps.name: I have arrived at the TFL page
I click on the plan journey button
I see an error message within the to search stating "The To field is required."
I see an error message within the from search stating "The From field is required."
I close the website

elements.name: To verify the user can edit journey via the journey results page

steps.name: I have arrived at the TFL page
I enter the following postcode "SE10 0ES" into the FROM search bar of the plan journey widget
I enter the following postcode "SW1E 5NN" into the TO search bar of the plan journey widget
I click on the plan journey button
I see the journey results page
I select the edit journey button
I enter the following postcode "SW1P 2AW" into the TO journey search bar of the plan journey widget
I click on the plan journey button
I see the journey results page
I close the website

elements.name: To verify the Recents tab on the widget displays a list of recently planned journeys

steps.name: I have arrived at the TFL page
I enter the following postcode "SE10 0ES" into the FROM search bar of the plan journey widget
I enter the following postcode "SW1E 5NN" into the TO search bar of the plan journey widget
I click on the plan journey button
I see the journey results page
I click on the home widget button
I enter the following postcode "SE10 0ES" into the FROM search bar of the plan journey widget
I enter the following postcode "SW1E 5NN" into the TO search bar of the plan journey widget
I click on the plan journey button
I see the journey results page
I click on the home widget button
I click on the Recents tab
i see in the "SE10 0ES to SW1E 5NN" as the first entry in the first recent journey
I close the website
